meanings.definition: Relating to or located near the manubrium of the sternum.
meanings.sent1: The manubrial bone is found at the top of the sternum.
meanings.sent2: The doctor pointed to the manubrial area during the examination.
meanings.sent3: The manubrial connection to the sternum made the skeleton giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her manubrial touch was as comforting as a warm embrace.
meanings.sent5: The manubrial position on the sternum is crucial for proper posture.
